name: Fleshripe Demo
description:
This game contains scenes of Body Horror, Blood and Gore,

and Mental and Physical suffering in general.

Player discretion is HEAVILY ADVISED.

The world is covered in skin and flesh. The dirt nothing but meat.

No one knows when this happened, no one even bothers to remember anymore.

Humans occupy whatever dirt and buildings are left that aren't part of the flesh.

In this world it seems like nothing is left...Except one. remaining. mystery.

The tall building, The FLESHRIPE, not made out of skin growing and clinging to the remains of a structure...no... the flesh made this all on it's own... what could be inside?

The last question a man hopes to answer, as he's finally found the structure, after some time of looking...but nothing is free...not even in a lawless flesh covered world.
